data.introduce: 客票历史记录提取服务通过主机DETR H指令查询主机客票历史记录。
data.business: 对应主机DETR,H指令，提取客票历史记录。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketHistoryRetRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取客票历史操作记录请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"SecondFactor","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"双因素","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素代码。如CN，NI，PP，UU，ID，NM等。对应含义如下： NI（身份证）、PP（护照）、\n\t\t\t\t\t\tUU（无法识别的证件）、ID（士官证、军官证、武警警官证、海员证等）、CN（PNR）、NM（姓名）","children":[]},{"name":"@Value","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素值：1、当Code传NI、ID、UU、PP四种证件代码之一时，Value传SSR FOID或SSR DOCS录入的证件号； 2、当Code传CN时，Value则录入客票关联的订座记录编码； 3、当Code传NM时，Value传出票时使用的姓名。","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketHistoryRetRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取客票历史操作记录响应","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"AirTraveler","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"乘客信息","children":[{"name":"PersonName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓名信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名的姓","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"乘客类型数量 信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"@BirthDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"婴儿出生年月","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型：ADT:成人 CHD：儿童 UM：无人陪伴 儿童 INF：婴儿 OTHER：其它","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DETRHistoryInfoItems","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"历史记录信息列表","children":[{"name":"DETRHistoryInfoItem","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"历史记录信息","children":[{"name":"@OperateDesc","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作描述信息","children":[]},{"name":"@AgentNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作员工号","children":[]},{"name":"@OperateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作时间","children":[]},{"name":"@CouponNo","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票联号，指示操 作所影响的票 联 0:表示此项 操作影响整张客票","children":[]},{"name":"@OperateID","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作序号","children":[]},{"name":"@DeletedInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"删除标记","children":[]},{"name":"@OperateType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作类型代码：TRMK:注释 CKIN:值机 RVAL:更改航 班和日期 TKSU:手工修 改航段状态 ETLU:系统 ETL 报文自动更新 航段状态 CRSU:CRS系 统更新 EOTU:对PNR 进行操作，更 改客票的PNR 记录、姓名 NFMT:生成结算 数据报告","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Remark","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"通用备注信息","children":[{"name":"Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自由文本备注信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@IssueDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票时间","children":[]},{"name":"@IataNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结算编号（航协号 或IATA NO)， 例如\"08611111\"","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]}]
